action_item: Topics - Discuss billing process in Dr. Cloud EHR including claims creation and marking claims as billed.
notes: Focus on the ability to print 837s and submit claims electronically.

action_item: Requirements - Update rate tables and master charge list in Dr. Cloud EHR.
notes: Ensure usual and customary rates are correctly reflected.

action_item: Requirements - Handle special billing scenarios using billing rules based on client age or diagnoses.
notes: Implement rules related to specific service codes.

action_item: Reports - Generate month-end closed report for the general ledger.
notes: Include contract management for payers' contracted rates.

action_item: Data Migration - Ensure the system supports multiple clearinghouses for claims submission.
notes: Verify the ability to mark claims as cleared for record-keeping.

action_item: Key Question - Clarify requirements for sending encounters to Medicaid authority for reporting.
notes: Determine the formatting needed for data submission.

action_item: Users & Roles - Set up notifications for claims not getting generated due to missing information.
notes: Allow customization of claim rules on a per-payer level.

action_item: Payers - Manage contracts with payers for billing amounts and adjustments.
notes: Ensure contracted rates are applied correctly in claims.

action_item: Reports - Generate net revenue report based on contracted rates.
notes: Include expected revenue and adjustments in the report.
